item.title: Report: Trump considering Ron DeSantis for defense secretary as Pete Hegseth nomination sputters
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is considering replacing Pete Hegseth as his nominee to lead the Pentagon with Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis.

item.title: Village People sailor changes tune on Trump's use of 'Y.M.C.A.': 'He's having a lot of fun with it'
item.description: Numerous artists have complained about President-elect Donald Trump's use of their songs at his rallies. The sailor in the Village People is no longer...

item.title: Judge overseeing Hunter Biden tax case blasts President Biden for pardon

item.title: Montana legislature refuses to ban transgender lawmaker from women's restroom at state capitol
item.description: The Montana state legislature declined to follow the U.S. Congress' lead on bathrooms, rejecting a proposal to assign restroom usage at the state Capi...

item.title: CNN panelists liken South Korea under martial law to U.S. under Trump
item.description: Two members of a CNN panel discussion Tuesday looked at the images of South Korea under martial law and saw America under Donald Trump.
